scripts.build:ui: npx rimraf part3/dist || true && cd part2/phonebook && npm ci && npm run build && cp -r build ../../part3/dist
scripts.build:ui:win: powershell -Command "if (Test-Path 'part3/dist') { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force 'part3/dist' }; Set-Location 'part2/phonebook'; npm ci; npm run build; Copy-Item -Recurse -Force 'build' '..\..\part3\dist'"
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push

scripts.build:ui: npx rimraf part3/dist || true && cd part2/phonebook && npm ci && npm run build && cp -r build ../../part3/dist
